Serialized Form

  • Package infra

    • Class infra.Parameters extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • portaSerial

          java.lang.String portaSerial
          The list of parameters to be saved. It is a good idea to set a initial value to each one of them. These values will be used whether those ones that were saved last time are lost.
